parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From pleres and phoreo; to carry out fully, i.e. Completely assure, entirely accomplish.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) of persons: powerful, able, (b) of things: possible. From dunamai; powerful or capable; neuter possible.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From epi and the base of aggelos; to announce upon, i.e. to engage to do something, to assert something respecting oneself.
